subject: p13352405
History: -year-old man, status post VATS procedure and decortication. Evaluate for pneumothorax.
Findings: Comparison is made to the prior study from. There are chest tubes with the distal tips at the right base and right apex. The previously seen pigtail catheter at the right base has been removed. There is a persistent moderate-sized right pleural effusion. No pneumothoraces are seen. There are low lung volumes. Cardiac silhouette is within normal limits.
